snippet: Though the Bronx has made progress from its time as a symbol of urban decay, it has not had much success in remaking its reputation.
abstract: Bronx leaders and advocates are continually frustrated in effort to remake borough's image, associated with blight and urban decay since 1970s; though crime has dropped, suburban-style ranch houses have risen from rubble, and hundreds of new stores including a Macy’s and a Target are opening in the borough, first question that many prospective companies ask is whether it is safe to do business there.
lead_paragraph: Though the Bronx has made progress from its time as a symbol of urban decay, it has not had much success in remaking its reputation.

headline.seo: The Bronx Struggles to Escape Its Image as the ‘Burning’ Borough
headline.main: Fighting the Image of the ‘Burning’ Borough
headline.print_headline: Fighting the Image of the ‘Burning’ Borough
